data.title: Bastion Hotel Groningen
data.meta_description: Bastion Hotel Groningen - 3 stars - situated in Groningen on the A7, near the centre & Martiniplaza ✓ Free parking & WiFi ✓ Lowest price at Bastion Hotels

Staying at Hotel Groningen

The 3-star Bastion Hotel Groningen offers 80 hotel rooms, equipped with all facilities for a comfortable stay. The hotel is situated in a green environment, just outside the centre of Groningen on the A7 and close to the A28. This means that you can easily reach the market of Groningen or Martiniplaza (travelling time approx. 15 minutes). The convenient location and good accessibility by both public and private transport makes a stay in this hotel favourite with our guests. Parking is for free at the Bastion Hotel in Groningen. Are you a sports fan? At the hotel you can use the free gym.

Free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel

Free parking at the hotel in Groningen

Easy to reach by car and public transport

Free fitness facilities

Near Martiniplaza and Groningen city centre (15 min.)

Free WiFi

At all Bastion Hotels, you can make use of free Wi-Fi, both in the public areas and in all hotel rooms.

Free Parking

This hotel offers free parking (subject to availability)

Restaurant

In the restaurant of this Bastion Hotel, you can enjoy an extensive breakfast buffet every day (€17,75/person). Besides that, you are welcome in the restaurant for lunch, dinner, or the daily special.

Airconditioning

All rooms in this Bastion Hotel are provided with a pleasant climate by means of air conditioning.

24-hours reception

You can walk into a Bastion Hotel at any time of the day. We are available 24 hours a day

Bar / Lounge

This Bastion Hotel has a nice bar. The hotel bar is opened daily until 11:30 p.m. (Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Airport and Best Western Amsterdam Airport: 12:00 a.m.)

Fitness room

Are you sporty? This Bastion Hotel has a gym for your daily workout.

Luggage storage

Guest Computer

There is a computer with internet access in the hotel lobby which you can use free of charge.

Packed lunch service

No time to have lunch somewhere or do you want something tasty for the road? Bastion Hotels offers a delicious packed lunch at a charge. Ask for it at the reception.

Vending machine

The hotel has a vending machine for drinks and snacks. Handy if you want to take something.

Laundry

From Monday to Friday, you can use our laundry service for a fee. If you hand in your laundry before 8:00am, it will be returned to you the same day. Ask for it at the reception

Wake-up service

Want to make sure you're awake on time? Then use our wake-up service. Ask for it at the reception.

Terrace

Citymap

Ask at the reception of this Bastion Hotel for a free city map.

Pay

At the Bastion Hotel you can pay in cash, by debit card or by credit card (Mastercard, VISA and American Express).

Online, you can pay for your reservation with iDeal, Mastercard, VISA, American Express, Maestro, PayPal, Mr. Cash and Giro Pay. You can also choose to pay on arrival at the hotel.

Charging station

This hotel has a number of charging stations for electric cars.

Restaurant & Bar

In the restaurant of our Bastion Hotel in Groningen you can enjoy an extensive breakfast buffet every day (€17,75/person). Besides that, you are welcome for lunch, dinner, or the daily special. A packed lunch for on the road is available on request.

Menu restaurant Groningen

Location & Accessibility

Bastion Hotel Groningen is easy to reach by car and public transport. The hotel is situated near the A7. The centre of Groningen can be reached in 10 minutes, including the Martinitoren and the Grote Markt. The Martini Plaza is 10 minutes away. Because of the convenient location, the surrounding cities such as Leeuwarden and Assen are easy to reach. Coming by public transport? From Groningen Station you can be in front of the hotel in 20 minutes.

How do I get to the hotel by public transport?

From Groningen Station take bus 76 in the direction of Hoogezand and get off at the stop Gotenburgweg. From here it is a 2-minute walk to the hotel.

How do I get to the hotel by car?

From the A7/A28 take exit 38 Groningen-Zuidoost and turn right onto the Europaweg. Then turn immediately left onto the Herningweg and continue on the Bornholmstraat. The hotel is on the left

Where can I park at the hotel?

There is free parking at the hotel. Based on availability.

Questions about Hotel Groningen

Here you will find answers to the most frequently asked questions about this hotel. Do you have another question? Please contact us, we are happy to help you!

What time can I check in and out?

Check-in at Hotel Groningen is possible from 2:00 p.m. Check-out is possible until 12:00 p.m.

Are you in the area of the hotel before the official check-in time and would like to check in earlier? Please call the hotel where you are staying. We cannot guarantee that you will be able to check in earlier. This depends on the availability of rooms in the hotel.

What are the opening hours of the breakfast buffet?

Opening hours breakfast buffet Hotel Groningen:

Monday to Friday: 06:00 to 09:00 a.m.

Saturday to Sunday: 07:00 to 10:30 a.m.

Does Hotel Groningen have double beds?

Our rooms in Hotel Groningenhave single beds. You can push the beds together like many of our guests do. On request we can also arrange this for you.

Can I park for free at the hotel?

Yes, the hotel has its own car park where you can park free of charge. This is based on availability.

Where do I pay the lowest price for this hotel?

You pay the lowest price for this hotel on our own website www.bastionhotels.com. Is our hotel cheaper elsewhere? Sleep the first night for free! View our lowest price guarantee here.

What are the COVID-19 measures in the hotel?

We take appropriate measures to protect the health of all our guests and employees and to prevent further spread of the virus. In doing so, we follow the measures and advice of the government. All information about the measures in our hotels can be found here. View measures
